subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh beat Cincinnati in the year’s final regular-season game to win the A.F.C. North, and division rival Baltimore will join both of those teams in the playoffs after outscoring Cleveland.
snippet: Pittsburgh beat Cincinnati in the year’s final regular-season game to win the A.F.C. North, and division rival Baltimore will join both of those teams in the playoffs after outscoring Cleveland.
